posts.name: icemannie
posts.cooked:
You have 2 ways to choose from for autos. The first is to have the autochooser configure itself from any autos you have created in PathPlanner. See this video

The second is what the previous reply indicated. Suggest you try the method in the video.

posts.name: Ryan DJ
posts.cooked: I tried both ways, and I still can’t get it to work. There is something causing an error in the code.
